narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This second pre-license inspection for a Class 'A' license and exit briefing were conducted with the facility
representative.
Microchipping as a method of identification has been approved. 
No regulated activity can occur until a valid USDA license is obtained.
The applicant must send the appropriate license fee to the following address:
2150 Centre Ave.
Bldg. B, MS 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
